misuses.description: The value of `count` is passed directly from the user-provided input `args` to the constructor of `PBEParameterSpec`, which can lead to weaknesses in the encryption algorithm if the value of `count` is too small.
misuses.recommendation: Validate the value of `count` before passing it to the constructor of `PBEParameterSpec` and ensure that it is large enough to provide adequate encryption strength.
